OOC: Yan, only ooC's not refering directly to the rpg should be 
placed below the IC post. I can't remember, but has Blot arrived?


--- Astroblast ---

Astroblast turns on Sinnertwin, "IGL fool, now has Blot arrived 
yet?" He moves his head slowly, scanning the bots around him, 
most of them Terrorcons.


On 22 Jul 2001, at 20:56, robertdahl wrote:

> Menasor's heavy frame is lifted out of the water, his head smashes
> against the island, as he is dragged away.
> 
> Sinnertwin looks up with interest, the other head busy chewing on
> something. "Where Menasor go?" he hissed in his brutish tone.
>
